summary:
Remodeled and resized Breezehome with unique items. Read the description for more details.
Skyrim and Skyrim + Hearthfire version availabe !
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f1c232][size=5]- Description -[/size][/color]

[size=3]Famous home in Whiterun resized, remodeled with a basement and with a new armor, shield, sword (1H) and bow.
The exterior stayed the same (except a chimney and totems at the door) to ensure compatibility
with mods that change Whiterun.[/size]
[size=3]
A version for those who [/size][u][size=4]HAVE[/size][/u][size=3] Hearthfire and those who [/size][u][size=4]DON'T[/size][/u][size=3].[/size]

[size=3]In HF version[/size]
[size=3]Alchemy furnishing is allways available (even if you have childrens room)[/size]
[size=3]Having childs room actually removes enchanter and and desk on the 2nd floor (images)[/size]

[size=3][u][color=#ff7700]REQUIRED: HEARTHFIRE[/color][/u]
[color=#ff7700](if you use HF version)[/color][/size]

[size=3][u]I did[/u] test how followers act and follow around the house (vanilla sistem and UFO)
[u]I did not[/u] test how it works when you adopt a child or get married and ask your spouse to move in.
(I don't do that so feedback please)[/size]

[size=3]Link to: [url=http://modgames.net/load/tes_v_skyrim/doma_i_lokacii/breezehome_1xm_39_ed/254-1-0-21457]Russian translation of the mod[/url]
[/size]
[color=#f1c232][size=5]- Features -[/size][/color]

[size=3][color=#f1c232]->[/color] Navmeshed[/size]
[size=3][color=#f1c232]->[/color] Alchemy and enchanter (if you don't have childs room)
[color=#f1c232]->[/color] Unique armor, shield, sword (1H) and bow with stats similar to ebony
(less damage and armor, but lighter and more critical damage)
[color=#f1c232]->[/color] Secret room with 5 mannequins, 10 weapon racks, 5 shield and 2 weapon plaques
and trap door that leads outside Whiterun (under the rug)
[color=#f1c232]->[/color] Spare bed in the houscarls room (basement)[/size]


[color=#f1c232][size=5]- Installation -[/size][/color]
[size=3]
Save before you install !!!
You can install this mod before you buy and upgrade Breezehome
or
if you already own it and have it upgraded (if you do remember to remove your stuff !!!)
[/size][size=3]Helpful mod:Â [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57376/?]Multiple Floor Sandboxing[/url][/size]


[color=#f1c232][size=5]- Known issues -[/size][/color]

[size=3][color=#f1c232]->[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32505/?]Skyrim Project Optimization[/url] (choose no homes version)
[color=#f1c232]->[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?]Alternate Start[/url] (places some weapons in the bedroom)
[color=#f1c232]->[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights and FX[/url] (again choose no breezehome or homes)
[color=#f1c232]->[/color] Anything that changes Breezehome[/size]


[size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1]- My Other Mods -[/url][/size][/font][size=5]
[/size]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]And a highly recommended mod[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53068/?][size=4]Rigmor of Bruma[/size][/url][size=4][/size]
[size=3]An EPIC 18 mission Quest/Companion Mod

[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Special thanks to:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1734939/?]billyro[/url] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69103/?]ARMOR SET[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8601225/?]jrc0011[/url] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71912/?]SWORD[/url]
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2951084/?]zajkoajko[/url] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55897/?]SHIELD[/url]
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1978030/?]DecimusMaximus[/url] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64440/?]BOW[/url][/size][/font]
[/center]
author: 1xmiha
